name: Futile
description:
On a late Saturday night, you are abruptly awoken from your drunken slumber by a deafening banging on your front door. As you approach, the hairs on your back begin to rise as your worst suspicion is confirmed. Zombies are at your door! Looks like that shotgun you bought for protection a while ago is about to come in handy...

You know you've got a few med-kits and shotgun shells laying around just in case something like this would happen. Search the flashing crates by holding E when you're near one. Shoot at the zombies and kick them far away when they get too close. Try to survive for as long as you can!

Controls
  • Mouse — Look
  • W, A, S, D — Move
  • Space — Kick
  • R — Reload
  • Left mouse button — Fire
  • Hold E — Search supply crate
Resources Used
  • 2D Pixel Art Ghoul Sprites
  • Unnerving Ambient Sounds
  • Snake's SECOND Authentic Gun Sounds Pack
  • Zombie Sound Pack
